Package rice.pastry.routing

Interface Summary
RouteMessageNotification  
Router Router is no longer just an application.
RouterStrategy  
RouteSetProtocol  
 

Class Summary
BroadcastRouteRow Broadcast message for a row from a routing table.
InitiateRouteSetMaintenance Initiate routing table maintenance on the local node
RequestRouteRow Request a row from the routing table from another node.
RouteMessage A route message contains a pastry message that has been wrapped to be sent to another pastry node.
RouteProtocolAddress The address of the route protocol at a pastry node.
RouterAddress The address of the router at a pastry node.
RouteSet A set of nodes typically stored in the routing table.
RoutingTable The Pastry routing table.
SendOptions This is the options for a client to send messages.
 

Exception Summary
NoLegalRouteToMakeProgressException
